医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
英国心脏基金会的研究卓越中心在曼彻斯特大学推出曼彻斯特大学（University of Manchester）颁布了英国心脏基金会（BHF）曼彻斯特研究中心卓越中心，此前授予了400万英镑的奖励，以支持领先的慈善机构的世界一流的心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/british-hend-foundee28099s-centre-of-research-excellence-excellence-launches-at-t-the-university-university-manchester.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/british-hend-foundee28099s-centre-of-research-excellence-excellence-launches-at-t-the-university-university-university-manchester.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fa99118-fd69-4102-b060-b060-95b35e545be2 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 05:30:00 -0500 British Heart Foundation’s Centre of Research Excellence launches at The University of Manchester
粮食不安全增加美国成年人的心血管风险一项研究揭示了性别和种族如何影响粮食不安全对美国成年人心血管疾病危险因素的影响。关键发现和含义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/food-insecurity-increases-cardiascular------------------- among-among-meng--merican-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/food-insecurity-increases-cardioscular-cardiascular-------------- among-among-merican-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7877b66f-8f36-4475-a3ddddddddddddddddddddddddddd-1c4aaa5faa7ec Mon, 03 Mar 2025 04:21:00 -0500 Food insecurity increases cardiovascular risk among American adults
DeepHealth将AI驱动的放射学信息学带到了Vienna的ECR 2025 DeepHealth，Inc。是AI驱动的健康信息学的全球领导者，也是Radnet，Inc。的全资子公司，将在欧洲放射学大会（ECR）2025的下一代AI驱动的放射学信息和人口筛查解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/deephealt-brings-brings-ai-power-radiology-informatics-informatics-to-ecr-2025-in-vienna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/deepheaph-brings-ai-power-radiology-informatics-informatics-to-ecr-2025-in-vienna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=361813b5-b114-45de-A377-377-3CEF5A3C2328 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 00:13:00 -0500 DeepHealth brings AI-powered radiology informatics to ECR 2025 in Vienna
Medtronic获得Brainsense自适应DBS技术的FDA批准对于美国医疗保健技术的全球领导者Medtronic Plc（NYSE：MDT）的一百万诊断为帕金森氏病的人，自豪地宣布了美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）批准BRAINSENSE™自适应深度大脑刺激（ADBS）和BRAINSENSER™Electrode™电极标识符（EI）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/medtronic-receives-fda-approval-for-brainsense-aptive-aptive-dbs-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/medtronic-receives-fda-approval-for-brains-aptive-aptive-dbs-dbs-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=321985A9-7AF5-4E9B-ABD2-768F12BE61A0 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 00:06:00 -0500 Medtronic receives FDA approval for BrainSense Adaptive DBS technology
开创世界上第一种用于镰状细胞疾病的CRISPR药物当Vijay Sankaran在2000年代中期是哈佛医学院的MD-PHD学生时，他的第一次临床遭遇之一是与一名24岁患者，其镰状细胞疾病几乎每周都疼痛发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/pioneering-the-worlde28099s-first-crispr-crispr-medicine-for sickle-cell-cell-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/pioneering-the-worlde28099s-first-crispr-medicine-for sickle-cell-cell-cell-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c749839-28CA-48BB-9A37-1AAF33CF666C2 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 00:02:00 -0500 Pioneering the world’s first CRISPR medicine for sickle cell disease
MEDI方法解锁了解码饮食习惯的新方法“告诉我你吃什么，我会告诉你你是谁” - 众所周知的言论准确地描述了新的Medi方法，用于与国际研究团队合作，从Med Uni Graz开发的DNA碎片中解码饮食习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/medi-method-unlocks-new-way-way-way-to-decode-decode-decode-nabits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/medi-method-unlocks-new-way-way-to-decode-decode-decode-decode-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341d8ecd-eaa5-4121-a218-6448df8d7601 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 23:25:00 -0500 MEDI method unlocks new way to decode dietary habits
蛋白质能力对于建造和维持肌肉质量必不可少这个世界蛋白质日，领先的营养和保健公司，康宝莱正在帮助神秘化蛋白质，并提供有关这种重要营养素的简单提示和信息。我们许多人都意识到蛋白质在饮食中的重要性，但并不总是确切地确切地实现这一目标以及它在饮食中所扮演的角色的细节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/protein-power-sesential-for-building-and-maintain-maintain-muscle-mass.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/protein-power-sesential-for-building-and-maintain-maintain-muscle-mass.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64496701-0C0E-432C-8C3B-0EDB-0EDB42D219E3 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 23:19:00 -0500 Protein power essential for building and maintaining muscle mass
开创性的扫描仪可以彻底改变乳腺癌的诊断和治疗阿伯丁大学科学家开发的开创性新扫描仪可能会改变乳腺癌的诊断和治疗方式，这意味着患者可以接受较少的手术和更加单独的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/groundbreaking-scanner-ccanner-could-revolutionsize-breast-cancer-diaroser-diarosis-and-ngnosis-and-woreatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/groundbreaking-scanner-canner-could-revolutions--breast-cancer-diarosis-diarosis-and-wareatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20fefc14-4444444f1a-b02c-345836Ed0c8d Sun, 02 Mar 2025 23:12:00 -0500 Groundbreaking scanner could revolutionize breast cancer diagnosis and treatment
Tandem Health推出了AI医学抄写员，以减轻英国医生的行政负担NHS和英国的医生将受益于开创性的人工智能技术，旨在改变医生与患者互动，减少医疗错误，减少行政负担以及进行数千次其他约会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/tandem-health-launches-ai-ai-medical-scribe-to-ease-uk-doctors-doctors-administrative-bitten.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/tandem-health-launches-ai-medical-scribe-to-yease-uk-uk-doctors-doctors-administrative-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e90B910-D9BB-4F58-91A1-6EF7A5733736 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 23:06:00 -0500 Tandem Health launches AI medical scribe to ease UK doctors' administrative burden
新的三轨系统为药代动力学研究提供了无动物的替代品创新的芯片专家Dynamic42和数字生命科学解决方案专家Esqlabs已成功地与拜耳消费者健康部以及Jena University医院的胎盘实验室密切合作，成功地开发了一个三器官系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/new-three-organ-system-offers-an-an-an-an-an-an-an-anmal-free-anternative-for-pharmacokinetics-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/new-three-organ-systems-offers-an-an-an-an-an-Animal-free-for-for-pharmacokinetics-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=742ade70-295d-48d7-8766-25ac504bb5a1 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 23:03:00 -0500 New three-organ system offers an animal-free alternative for pharmacokinetics research
